RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 20. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALL AMERICAN JEWEL away alertly, set all the pace while nicely rated and maintained her advantage under mild urging. VIVE EL MOMENTO never far back, loomed boldly three wide nearing the quarter pole and finished second best. MISS HEART within striking distance from the start, offered a mild bid three wide before six furlongs then was outfinished. NO SNIVELING rushed to contention between rivals after a quarter, chased the winner into the stretch then came up empty. FLECK had good early speed along the inside then faded. PRINCESS MORO was no factor and finished on even terms with FLECK at the wire. DESIGNATE chased the winner around the clubhouse turn then was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: All American Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led throughout, nicely rated, held well,

ENTRY.NAME: No Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contention backstretch, empty lane

ENTRY.NAME: Vive El Momento
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly, 3 wide 2nd turn, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 30100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).es) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIEF RANDEL away alertly, prompted the pace along the rail into the turn, made the lead near the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and drew off under mild right handed urging. MUTINY broke well, set a pressured pace two wide for nearly a half then was no match for the winner while just hanging on for second. IT'S YOUR CALL close up from the start along the inside, altered course five wide at the top of the stretch, had a mild late rally and just missed getting up for second. VISUAL MISSION went evenly. LITTLE BLAKER broke sharply, stalked the pace two wide into the stretch and faded late. MISTER MOBIL failed to menace. NICK CAN FIX trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Blaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, stalked pace 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Randel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, perfect trip, drew off, right urging

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Harry D. Waite & Ronald C. Waite

ENTRY.NAME: It's Your Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, altered course 5 wide to lane, surged, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mutiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, 2 wide, held place,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIGHTVILLE battled for the lead two wide into the far turn, shook clear then widened the balance of the trip under right handed urging to win going away. PATIO PARTY battled with the winner along the inside into the far turn, altered course to the five path in upper stretch then was no match while clear for second. BIG FRANK outrun early while outside, swung wide and had a mild late rally. BEYOND MY DREAMS well placed, failed to respond. WINWITHJIMMY was no threat. MONEY FOR MISCHIEF allowed to settle, got out far on the far turn and lost ground. MASTER OF WAR trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside, altered course 5path top lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Fightville
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Money for Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: got out far turn, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Frank
ENTRY.OWNER: Lady Smith Stable LLC and Sayban Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide, mild rally mid track

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SACRED BEAUTY bumped at the start, prompted the pace three then four wide, made the lead before a half, set the balance of the pace and shook clear through the stretch under strong handling. CAUSE OF LOVE battled for the lead along the inside into the far turn, angled out then was no match for the winner while clear for second three wide. DATTTSAFANCYFOX was bumped between rivals and squeezed at the start, surged between horses to press the pace after a quarter, kept on into the stretch along the inside and was outfinished. ESTILO ELEGANTE failed to menace. CHORIST well placed, failed to respond. SCOOP THERE IT IS bumped at the start then failed to menace. QUEEN HIGH battled for the early lead two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Cause of Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside, angled out 2nd turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, surged between horses, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 3-4wide, drew clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE COACHMAN away alertly, battled for the early lead, inherited a daylight advantage before the half mile marker, set the balance of the pace and widened at will through the stretch to win as much the best. WHEN IN ROME chased the winner and finished second best in the five path. JOYRIDE avoided a foe in distress at the seven sixteenths marker then found his best stride late inside of rivals. THE EQUINEST stalked the pace in the five path into the stretch, drifted out a bit then went evenly. CAJUN BAYOU was no threat. OLD FORTY FIVE failed to menace. BAYOU SHACK moved up in the four path through the turn then came up empty. MANUKA BOBBY broke in front, matched strides for the early lead, suffered a catastrophic injury before the half mile pole and was euthanized.

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Star Bird Eye Synd LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Joyride
ENTRY.COMMENT: avoided foe 7/16 pole, best stride late, inside,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 20. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONNELS CREEK rushed to lead the lead five then four wide, set a pressured pace into the stretch, dropped to the rail, edged clear under right handed urging past the furlong marker and lasted under strong handling. KEYED ON TOP battled for the early lead along the inside, dropped back a bit, angled off the rail two wide past the furlong marker then came on again but just missed. LORD OF LEGENDS bore out at the start bumping O CIGANO, contested the early lead two wide then was outfinished three wide. O CIGANO was bumped at the start, had good early speed four then three wide then faded. PLATINUM MAC failed to menace. BALTIC FLEET was no threat. LOCK ON was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John

ENTRY.NAME: Keyed On Top
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled inside, angled out past 1/8pole, gaining 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lord of Legends
ENTRY.OWNER: Mathes Julie and Self Mary T
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, battled 2 wide, outfinished 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: O Cigano
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, start, good early speed, 4-3wide, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Donnels Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, 4 wide, set pressured pace, angled in, all out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Ra ces Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEEKENDER rushed up to contest the lead two wide before a half, matched stride into the stretch and drew clear late under right handed urging. INTO GOLD stalked the pace three wide and finished clear for second. TURNING PAGES broke in front, set the pace for a half, dueled for the lead with the winner along the inside until deep stretch then weakened. CHOCOLATE PHILLING failed to menace. LOTSA MATCHA was no factor. STREAKY chased the early pace and was through after a half. TEQUILA FLATS hopped at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Weekender
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contention, dueled 1/2 pole to lane, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Turning Pages
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, early pace inside, dueled to lane, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 60. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KERRI'S MIRACLE close up from the start, circled rivals rapidly four wide on the turn, made the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off under a hand ride. LEMON MOUSSE sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch and gamely held on for second along the rail. BEAUTIFUL LASS stalked the early pace, loomed boldly three wide midway on the turn then was outfinished. EXPRESS FASHION failed to menace. SEEKING THE MONEY pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted to the five path then weakened. TV TIZ GORGEOUS had good early speed along the inside then faded. STARLITESLEW had brief speed. DANES LAST SONG was no factor. ANIMO STAR lost contact with her field soon after the start, was distanced and walked off. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Mousse
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, inside, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost contact early, distanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking the Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted 5path, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kerri's Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, closed fast, 4 wide, drew off, hand ride
